steps.item: Sign in to Mingle as a project administrator and open the project in which you want to create a card tree (if you're not already working in the project).

bullets.title: From anywhere in Mingle
bullets.item: From the Project admin menu, select the Card trees link. Mingle will take you to the Card trees page. Then select the Configure link next to the Card tree where you want to create the aggregate property.

steps.title: Or, from Card Tree view
steps.item: Select View tree configuration in the area above the tree.

item.p: Select configure in the card configuration that is shown.

screenshot.alttext: Configure tree from Card Tree view

item.p: Mingle will display the Configure card tree page.
From the Configure card tree page, click on the Edit aggregate properties link. Mingle will display the Aggregate properties page.
